• Assist in drafting and scheduling posts for LinkedIn (and other social media channels) and the company websites.
• Help prepare visual and written materials such as short articles, event summaries, and newsletters.
• Support the creation of brochures, flyers, and project presentations.
• Participate in the organization and promotion of company events, workshops, and product demonstrations.
• Help maintain consistent branding and tone across all communication channels.
• Support website updates and online content optimization.
• Assist in tracking social media engagement and preparing basic analytics reports.
Contribute ideas for social media campaigns and new digital formats.
Research trends in GIS, 3D scanning, and digital marketing to inspire new content.
Work with Canva or Adobe tools to create simple visuals and short promotional materials.
Help coordinate and document video/photo content for marketing and educational use.
Contribute to shaping the visual identity of both Pro GIS Solutions and Pro SCAN Solutions.
• Student or recent graduate in Marketing, Communication, Journalism, Geography, or related fields.
• Good writing and communication skills in English (Romanian required, French is a plus).
• Interest in technology, GIS, or 3D visualization is highly appreciated.
• Familiarity with social media platforms (especially LinkedIn) and basic content creation tools (Canva, Photoshop, or similar).
• Attention to detail and willingness to learn in a fast-paced, creative environment.
• Curiosity about how mapping, 3D scanning, or digital twins can be promoted in real-world industries.
• Experience creating visuals, videos, or short posts for university projects or social media.
• A supportive and hands-on learning environment where you’ll gain experience in marketing within the tech and geospatial industry.
Mentorship from professionals working in GIS, 3D scanning.
Real exposure to marketing campaigns, events and product launches.
Opportunity to contribute to real company projects and grow your professional portfolio.
